channel.title: How to fix [most webclient errors]
channel.description:
hi, [size=12pt]must do rics [tut] before do this[/size] step1:open class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java search for ./Files/Spirts/ change to C:/.yourclientname/Sprites/ (cache) name (ctrl+h) find ./Files/Spirts/ and replace all with C:/.yourclientname/Sprites/ YOURCLIENTNAME CHANGE TO CACHE NAME ON "C" drive
step2: search for ./Files/interface/ change to C:/.yourclientname/interface/ YOURCLIENTNAME CHANGE TO CACHE NAME ON "C" drive
notes: if u didn't found spirts then search for ./Files/Spirtes/ if u didn't found spirts then search for ./Files/interfaces/ move ur spirts or spirtes folder to cache
credits :100% for me

item.title: How to fix [most webclient errors]
item.dc:creator: @kalson744 kalson744
item.description:
@kalson744 wrote:

hi,
[size=12pt]must do rics [tut] before do this[/size]
step1:open class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java
search for ./Files/Spirts/
change to C:/.yourclientname/Sprites/
(cache) name
(ctrl+h) find ./Files/Spirts/ and replace all with C:/.yourclientname/Sprites/
YOURCLIENTNAME CHANGE TO CACHE NAME ON “C” drive

step2: search for ./Files/interface/
change to C:/.yourclientname/interface/
YOURCLIENTNAME CHANGE TO CACHE NAME ON “C” drive

notes:
if u didn’t found spirts then search for ./Files/Spirtes/
if u didn’t found spirts then search for ./Files/interfaces/
move ur spirts or spirtes folder to cache

credits :100% for me
